title: Customer Service Practice Competency Enhancement: Project-Based Learning Integrating Educational Technology and Learning Theories

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners perform team collaboration in project-based learning environments using educational technology tools at a frequency of 80% or higher
Learners can concretely explain strategies for solving complex social problems through digitally designed learning modules applying cognitive science principles
Learners can revise and improve their leadership practice plans at least twice based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
